alert.note: Alert for Robeson (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 21 at 10:30AM EST until January 22 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. * WHERE...In South Carolina, Marlboro, Darlington and Dillon Counties. In North Carolina, Robeson County. * WHEN...Until noon EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Light freezing rain is expected to develop this afternoon. It will change over the snow or a mixture of snow and sleet this evening, then taper off late tonight.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
